title: Summoner Name Swap
body: It has now been 3 days since I submitted my ticket, 2 days since my last contact with support. How much longer will this take?

replies.body:
We've had a lot of support tickets submitted lately, so response times are a bit longer than normal. Sit tight and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I appreciate the feed back, will do.
